name: Abandonment
description: A sense of abandonment, often reflecting fears of isolation or rejection.

name: Danger
description: Experiencing threats, peril, or fear of harm; common in chase or falling dreams.

name: Confusion
description: A lack of clarity or control, often depicting unfamiliar or puzzling situations.

name: Freedom
description: A sensation of liberation, escape, or the ability to overcome limitations.

name: Love
description: Feeling affection, care, or strong emotional connections with others.

name: Anxiety
description: Heightened stress or worry, often linked to situations of loss, failure, or unpreparedness.

name: Disappointment
description: A sense of sadness or regret, typically when expectations are unmet or desired outcomes are reversed.

name: Empowerment
description: Feeling powerful, confident, or in control, often experienced as overcoming obstacles.

name: Isolation
description: A feeling of loneliness or separation, reflecting emotional distance or disconnection.

name: Temptation
description: Being drawn to something desirable but potentially harmful, often depicting internal conflict.

name: Curiosity
description: A strong urge to explore, seek answers, or investigate the unknown in a dream setting.

name: Mystery
description: The presence of an unsolved puzzle, hidden meanings, or an elusive situation.

name: Strength
description: Feeling strong, resilient, and capable of facing challenges head-on.

name: Forgiveness
description: Letting go of grudges or reconciling with oneself or others, leading to inner peace.

name: Safety
description: A sense of being protected from harm, usually appearing in calming or comforting dreams.

name: Other
description: A theme that doesn't fit into any of the other categories.
